data.actual_result: The text changes to "suppressed" and closes.
data.expected_result: The popup text should stay the same and close.
data.short_description: When moved from AFK channel, the popup shows "suppressed"
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a non-AFK voice channel - Have an admin move you to an AFK channel.  If you haven't disabled the popup, it should tell you that you are AFK. - Have an admin move you back to any voice channel.  For a split second, the text on the popup box will change to "suppressed" and tell you that you don't have permission to speak.
